txt.en: Quickbeam is at Derndingle in south-east Fangorn.
Rocks are preventing the forest north-east of Wellinghall from growing
Quickbeam has asked you to quiet the forest north-east of Wellinghall.
Tend the forest north-east of Wellinghall

'When we marched on Isengard, the forest was awoken. It is very angry with the actions of the wizard we trusted. Too angry, I cannot calm it myself.\n\n'Please tend the forest north-east of Wellinghall.'
Wood-trolls have awoken in the forest north-east of Wellinghall
When the Ents decided to march to war, the forest awoke, angry and betrayed. With Isengard destroyed, Quickbeam is attempting to calm Fangorn and quiet it once more.
